statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE account_status = 'active';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE account_status = 'active' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE account_status = 'pending' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' OR first_name = 'Jane';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE account_status='Active';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE account_status='active'
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, account_status FROM customers WHERE account_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE account_status='Active';
SELECT * FROM addresses INNER JOIN customers ON addresses.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE state='California';
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, orders.total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE account_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE account_status = 'active';

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, addresses.street_address, addresses.city, addresses.state, addresses.postal_code FROM customers INNER JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, orders.order_date, orders.total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 100;

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, payments.payment_date, payments.amount, payments.payment_method FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id INNER JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id WHERE payments.amount > 50 ORDER BY payments.payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE account_status='Active';
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_total > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM Interactions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, account_status FROM Customers WHERE account_status = 'active';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Addresses.city, Addresses.state FROM Customers INNER JOIN Addresses ON Customers.customer_id = Addresses.customer_id WHERE Addresses.state = 'CA' ORDER BY Customers.customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
